fw.name: KnowHow
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

enum.name: CorrectingFunctionTypeEnum
enum.abstract: Type of the corrective action to be performed on a false check.

enum.name: OutputFormatEnum
enum.abstract: Output format of the text report.

enum.name: ShowResultsEnum
enum.abstract: Sorting option for the text report.

enum.name: VisualizationTypeEnum
enum.abstract: Type of checks to be chosen.

class.name: CATExpertRuleEnum
class.abstract: Enumerated type for the solving type of the rule base.

enum.name: InferenceEngineType
enum.abstract: Solving type of the rule base.

class.name: CATExpertSolveModeEnum
class.abstract: Enumerated type for the retrieving of facts needed by the rulebase.

enum.name: SolveModeEnum
enum.abstract: Retrieving of facts for the rulebase, done just before solving the rulebase.

class.name: CATICheck
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to defining the basic possibilities of an expert check.

method.name: ApplyCorrect
method.abstract: Triggers the application of the correction function of the check on the t-uples failing the condition.

method.name: ApplyHighlight
method.abstract: Highlights each object of the t-uples failing the condition.

method.name: GetAutomaticCorrect
method.abstract: Gets the correction function triggering mode.

method.name: GetCorrectFunction
method.abstract: Gets the VB script executed as a correction function.

method.name: GetCorrectFunctionComment
method.abstract: Gets the comment of the correction function.

method.name: GetCorrectFunctionType
method.abstract: Gets the correction function type.

method.name: GetHelp
method.abstract: Gets the help string.

method.name: GetJustification
method.abstract: Gets the justification string.

method.name: GetStatus
method.abstract: Gets the validity of the check.

method.name: SetAutomaticCorrect
method.abstract: Sets the correction function to be triggered automatically or not.

method.name: SetCorrectFunction
method.abstract: Sets the script executed as a correction function.

method.name: SetCorrectFunctionComment
method.abstract: Sets the comment of the correction function.

method.name: SetCorrectFunctionType
method.abstract: Sets the correction function type.

method.name: SetHelp
method.abstract: Sets the help string.

method.name: SetJustification
method.abstract: Sets the justification string.

class.name: CATICheckReport
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to retrieving the t-uples of an expert check, or information on that check.

method.name: AddTupleFailed
method.abstract: Add one t-uples in the list of failed t-uples.

method.name: AddTupleSucceeded
method.abstract: Add one t-uples in the list of succeeded t-uples.

method.name: ExtractReportObjects
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of specified t-uples.

method.name: GetGenericRuleBaseComponent
method.abstract: Returns the component (check, ruleset or rulebase) to which this check report is linked.

method.name: NumberFailed
method.abstract: Returns the number of t-uples failing the condition.

method.name: NumberSucceeded
method.abstract: Returns the number of t-uples succeeding the condition.

method.name: ResetReport
method.abstract: Resets the report.

method.name: SetReport
method.abstract: Sets the report type.

method.name: StopGenerateTuple
method.abstract: Stop to fill the t-uples list automatically.

enum.name: ReportEnum
enum.abstract: Type of t-uples to be retrieved.

class.name: CATIGenericRuleBaseComponent
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to defining the basic properties of the Knowledge Expert hierarchy of rulebase, rulesets, checks and rules.

method.name: CheckInContext
method.abstract: Parses and adds the component to the inference engine.

method.name: GetActivate
method.abstract: Gets the activity of the component.

method.name: GetFatherRuleSet
method.abstract: Gets the ruleset the component belongs directly to.

method.name: GetGenericRuleBaseComponentName
method.abstract: Gets the name of the component.

method.name: GetInferenceEngineType
method.abstract: Gets the type of the inference engine.

method.name: GetRuntimeBase
method.abstract: Gets the rulebase the component belongs (directly or through rulesets) to.

method.name: IsUseOnly
method.abstract: Gets the "use-only-ness" of the component.

method.name: SetActivate
method.abstract: Sets the activity of the component.

method.name: SetGenericRuleBaseComponentName
method.abstract: Sets the name of the component.

method.name: SetInferenceEngineType
method.abstract: Sets the type of the inference engine.

method.name: SetUseOnly
method.abstract: Forces the component to be use-only (not editable, not removable).

class.name: CATIReportObject
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to the behaviour of an element (t-uple) of a report.

method.name: AddInstanceInTuple
method.abstract: Adds the instance at the end of the report object instances list.

method.name: GetCheckReport
method.abstract: Gets the check report that generated this report object.

method.name: GetInstanceFromTuple
method.abstract: Gets the instance at the position <tt>index</tt> in the t-uple.

method.name: GetValidity
method.abstract: Gets the validity of the report object.

method.name: SetFromCheck
method.abstract: Do not use.

method.name: SetValidity
method.abstract: Sets the validity of the report object.

method.name: TupleReset
method.abstract: Clears the t-uple.

method.name: TupleSize
method.abstract: Gets the size of the t-uple.

class.name: CATIReportOptions
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to customizing the report of an expert check.

method.name: GetDescriptionLength
method.abstract: Gets the size of description (verbose or not).

method.name: GetOutputFormat
method.abstract: Gets the output format (text, HTML, .

method.name: GetReportPath
method.abstract: Gets the path where the report will be generated.

method.name: GetShowResults
method.abstract: Gets the way the elements of the report are ordered.

method.name: GetVisualizationType
method.abstract: Gets the visualization type.

method.name: SetDescriptionLength
method.abstract: Sets the size of description (verbose or not).

method.name: SetOutputFormat
method.abstract: Sets the output format (text, HTML, .

method.name: SetReportPath
method.abstract: Sets the path where the report will be generated.

method.name: SetShowResults
method.abstract: Sets the way the elements of the report are ordered.

method.name: SetVisualizationType
method.abstract: Sets the visualization type.

class.name: CATIRule
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to describing expert rules.

method.name: GetPriority
method.abstract: Gets the priority of the rule.

method.name: SetPriority
method.abstract: Sets the priority of the rule.

class.name: CATIRuleBase
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to the rulebase behaviour.

method.name: AddFact
method.abstract: Adds a fact.

method.name: AddListOfInstances
method.abstract: Adds a list of facts to the rule base.

method.name: AddRootOfFacts
method.abstract: Adds a root for the search of the facts.

method.name: GetRootsOfFacts
method.abstract: Gets a copy of the set of facts roots.

method.name: GetRuleBaseOwner
method.abstract: Returns the owner of the relation set the rulebase belongs to.

method.name: GetSolveMode
method.abstract: Gets the solve mode of the rulebase.

method.name: Import
method.abstract: Imports in the rulebase, the contents of the rulebase of another document.

method.name: ImportRuleBase
method.abstract: Imports in the rulebase the content of another rulebase.

method.name: ImportWithLink
method.abstract: Imports from the rulebase, the contents of this rulebase to another document.

method.name: ReloadFact
method.abstract: Reloads a fact.

method.name: RemoveFact
method.abstract: Removes a fact.

method.name: RemoveRootOfFacts
method.abstract: Removes a facts root.

method.name: SetOwner
method.abstract: Sets the owner of the rulebase.

method.name: SetSolveMode
method.abstract: Sets the solve mode of the rulebase.

method.name: Solve
method.abstract: Solves the rule base.

method.name: SolveWithoutUpdate
method.abstract: Solves the rule base.

method.name: VolatileCopy
method.abstract: Returns a volatile (not persistent), non changeable copy of the current rulebase.

class.name: CATIRuleBaseComponent
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to describing the common contents of leaf nodes of the Knowledge Expert hierarchy.

method.name: GetDescription
method.abstract: Returns the body translated in KWE language if needed.

method.name: GetDescriptionByLanguage
method.abstract: Returns the body in the specified language of the rule base component.

method.name: GetLanguage
method.abstract: Gets the language of the body of component.

method.name: GetVariables
method.abstract: Gets the names of the types used.

method.name: SetLanguage
method.abstract: Sets the language of the body of component.

method.name: UpdateDescription
method.abstract: Updates the names of the types used and the body.

enum.name: RuleBaseComponentLanguage
enum.abstract: Language in which the body of the component is written.

class.name: CATIRuleBaseFactory
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to describe the factory for creation of rulebases, rulesets, rules and checks.

method.name: CreateBase
method.abstract: Creates a rule base.

method.name: CreateCheck
method.abstract: Creates a check in a container.

method.name: CreateLinkedBase
method.abstract: Creates a linked rule base in a container.

method.name: CreateLinkedRuleBase
method.abstract: Creates a linked rule base in a container.

method.name: CreateReport
method.abstract: Creates a report object for a check report.

method.name: CreateRule
method.abstract: Creates a rule in a container.

method.name: CreateRuleset
method.abstract: Creates a rule set in a container.

class.name: CATIRuleSet
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to elementary operations on a rule set.

method.name: AddRuleBaseComponent
method.abstract: Adds a rulebase component under this rule set, if a rulebase component with the same name does not already exist.

method.name: AddRuleSet
method.abstract: Adds a ruleset under this rule set, if a ruleset with the same name does not already exist.

method.name: CreateCheck
method.abstract: Creates a check under the current ruleset.

method.name: CreateRule
method.abstract: Creates a rule under the current ruleset.

method.name: CreateRuleset
method.abstract: Creates a rule set under the current ruleset.

method.name: FindAnyRuleBaseComponent
method.abstract: Returns all the rulebase components (rules and checks) under this rule set.

method.name: FindAnyRuleSet
method.abstract: Returns all the rulesets under this rule set.

method.name: FindRuleBaseComponent
method.abstract: Returns the first rulebase component (rule or check), under this rule set, with the according name.

method.name: FindRuleSet
method.abstract: Returns the first ruleset under this rule set, with the according name.

method.name: GetAllGenericRuleBaseComponents
method.abstract: Returns all generic rule base components under this rule set, recursively.

method.name: GetDirectGenericRuleBaseComponents
method.abstract: Returns all generic rule base components right under this rule set.

method.name: ImportRuleBaseComponent
method.abstract: Import one rulebase component (check or rule) into the current ruleset.

method.name: ImportRuleSet
method.abstract: Imports the contents of a ruleset into the current one.

method.name: RemoveRuleBaseComponent
method.abstract: Removes a rule base component under this rule set.

method.name: RemoveRuleSet
method.abstract: Removes a ruleset under this rule set.

method.name: Status
method.abstract: Returns the status of the ruleset.

typedef.name: conflictingImportFunctionPtr
typedef.abstract: Function pointer dedicated to the management of conflict when importing a rulebase into another one.
